name: You Are Not Alone (robottinis)
description:
You are the last remaining member of the doomed XAI foundation expedition Gemini, sent to investigate some forgotten alien ruins on a faraway planet. After barricading yourself in the workers' barracks for several days, you realize nobody is coming to save you: you are on your own, yet you are NOT alone.

Tip: always look behind you if you hear footsteps

if the sensitivity is too high it's possible to reduce it in the options (press esc). Unfortunatly the audio volume is not implemented so lowering it does nothing, sorry!
